subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: It was the Red Sox who lost, 3-1, and watched the other team — the one that a year ago was still the A.L.’s resident doormat — advance to the World Series.
snippet: It was the Red Sox who lost, 3-1, and watched the other team — the one that a year ago was still the A.L.’s resident doormat — advance to the World Series.
